title: HP Pavilion Gaming Ryzen 5 Hexa Core 4600H - (8 GB/1 TB HDD/Windows 10 Home/4 GB Graphics/NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650) 15-ec1021AX Gaming Laptop  (15.6 inch, Shadow Black, 2.04 kg)

product_specification.Sales Package: Laptop, Power Adaptor, User Guide, Warranty Documents
product_specification.Clock Speed: 3 GHz with Turbo Boost Upto 4 GHz
product_specification.USB Port: 1 x SuperSpeed USB Type C (5 Gbps Signaling Rate), 1 x SuperSpeed USB Type A (5 Gbps Signaling Rate), 1 x USB 2.0 Type A (HP Sleep and Charge)
product_specification.Screen Type: Full HD WLED Backlit Anti-glare IPS Micro-edge Display (250 nits Brightness, 45% NTSC Color Gamut, 141 ppi)
product_specification.Keyboard: Full-size Island-style Ultra Violet Backlit Keyboard with Numeric Keypad
product_specification.Pointer Device: HP Imagepad with Multi-touch Gesture Support (Precision Touchpad Support)
product_specification.Included Software: HP Documentation, HP e-service, HP BIOS Recovery, HP Smart, HP Jumpstarts, HP Audio Switch, HP Audio Boost, HP Support Assistant, HP SSRM, Dropbox
product_specification.Additional Features: 52.5 WHr Li-ion Polymer Battery with Fast Charge Support, MU-MIMO Supported, Miracast Compatible

product_description.Intuitive Interface: The Omen Command Centre of this laptop is an interface that allows you to navigate and discover new features with ease. The Dynamic Hero tile showcases important experiences at the top so you can quickly view them. The tile-based feature navigation helps highlight several features simultaneously and the Dynamic content displays new updates or features. These features make this interface perfect for gamers.
product_description.Versatile Task Management: You can use the Omen Command Centre to help manage your tasks by tuning the system and personalizing it. Thanks to the network boosters, bandwidth for key tasks can be easily prioritized. The Omen Command Centre’s system vitals offer a quick view which makes it a breeze to work or play games on this laptop.
product_description.Enhanced Gaming Experience: The Omen Command Center offers a seamless gaming experience as it launches the app quickly so you can access the games of your choice. It also integrates My Games with gaming platforms, such as Epic, Origin, Steam, and UPlay, so you can access them in a single place.
product_description.Graphics Processor: Play your favorite games smoothly and seamlessly on this gaming laptop as it comes with a powerful 4 GB of GDDR6 NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 graphics memory and DirectX 12. You can play games even in dimly lit environments, thanks to the illuminated keyboard and integrated numeric pad.
product_description.Powerful Processor: This gaming laptop features the AMD Ryzen 5-4600H processor and 8 GB of DDR4 RAM (upgradable up to 16 GB), so you can enjoy a fast and seamless computing experience.
product_description.Storage Options: This gaming laptop offers up to 1 TB HDD storage space (upgradable up to 1 TB HDD + 1 TB SSD - sold separately) so that you can store all your favorite gaming titles, videos, pictures, movies, and more in a single place. The large storage space ensures this system functions smoothly and boots up in seconds.
product_description.Vivid and Vibrant Display: This laptop features thin micro-edge bezels that measure less than 7 mm on three of its sides to offer more display area and also comes with an edge-to-edge keyboard to offer more keyboard area. Featuring a 39.62-cm (15.6) anti-glare IPS display and a 1080p Full HD resolution, this laptop is here to revolutionize the way you view content on a laptop.
product_description.Powerful Audio: This HP Pavilion laptop’s front-firing dual speakers and B&O Audio ensure that you can enjoy clear and high-fidelity sound at all times, irrespective of whether you’re playing games, watching videos, or working.
product_description.Wireless Connectivity: Bid goodbye to spotty internet connections as this laptop features the Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX 200 (2x2) WLAN adapter. Also, you can enjoy a powerful wireless connection with compatible devices as this laptop supports Bluetooth v5.0.

review: It's the best I got in this segment. It has a best performance in gaming as well as useful in business too. It's worth for money.

Definitely a good laptop at its price point.
HDD makes the device a bit slow.
But you have a plenty of option to upgrade both storage and memory.
Nice screen.
It gets quite hot when running even moderate tasks(It has the right to get a little hot :-P as its a performance oriented machine)
I do like the design but the whole body is fingerprint magnet, also I would like to add that this thing dosnt come with a fingerprint reader, so dosent support windows hello.
Talking about HP service, its just terrible. That's it.
After 3 months of usage:
Build quality is below average, flimsy feel and somewhat loose joints and have sharp edges.

Its a great laptop. I would recommend it, have tried out few games like Gta V, witcher 3 etc. works fine. Start up time is about 30-40 sec its fine as it is having HDD. If i upgrade to ssd this would surely come down. Over all very good laptop for gaming or editing or even profession use.

HDD makes it very slow, it seems like you are using a 90's desktop from our childhood... An SSD upgrade is must in this varient. If you are purchasing this one. Review after one year of use. Gaming frame drops after some months. Can't play more than an hour. Heating issue. Best for office work and coding. Smooth and fast performance.

Got this at a price of 51k during sale. Totally satisfied with the outcome. Performance is great considering the price, get an additional SSD and RAM (personal suggestion). It will definitely turn this laptop into a beast. Battery backup is of approx 4-5 hours, which is very good for a gaming laptop. Display quality is nice, but I've been facing a bit of screen bleeding issue from the beginning. Since, there's no problem in display quality experience due to this, it's totally fine (exchanging and refunding process are very hectic for me). Getting this HDD version and adding a SSD costed me less than buying a SSD variant and an external HDD separately (as per requirement I needed more internal storage space). Go for the SSD variant 5600H model if storage is not your priority.
